text: Buissy is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A farming village located 15 miles (24 km) southeast of Arras on the D14 road, at the junction with the D19. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Médard, dating from the sixteenth century * The Quéant Road Cemetery, overseen by the Commonwealth War Graves Commission. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * The CWGC cemetery at Quent Road, Buissy Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Buissy
